item.title: List of materials to study
item.description: Links What is NetDevOps? Why? - Leslie Carr (SFMIX), RIPE71 also check the spotify github for production playbooks NAPALM - Elisa Jasinska & David Barroso, NANOG64 How Facebook Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Network (Jose Leitao, David Rothera, RIPE71) Solutions Initial provisioning for Cisco - inc. answering / skipping the initial setup dialog - https://github.com/bittsi/bnas/tree/master/Staging/prepare/tasks
